document_data.name: Forty Years Loose-Gowned: Memoirs of a Noble Lowcoin Lass
document_data.author: [[Murathauna Darmeir]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Forty Years Loose-Gowned: Memoirs of a Noble Lowcoin Lass''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Murathauna Darmeir]] about her life working as a [[coinlass]] for forty years. It was published in the year [[1338 DR]].

{{quote|''Married thrice, and a lover of many men more, I have seen into the minds of many men with my [[spell]]s. 'Tis astonishing, even after all this time, what darksome cesspits most men's minds are.''}}
